meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'socialpost'

languageKey.label: SocialPost
posting System to Social Network for TYPO3
Already published on Facebook
Do not publish on Facebook
Already published on Twitter
Do not publish on Twitter
Publish news on Twitter and Facebook
Publish news records on Twitter and Facebook
Application site url: The website url that you set in your application http://www.example.com/
Log File Path: This is the path to the log file where messages will be saved when the event occurs.
Enable Facebook Posting.
Facebook Application ID: The ID of your Facebook application
Facebook secret: The application secret of your Facebook application
Fan page ID: The ID of the page that you want this application to post to
Group page ID: The ID of the group that you want this application to post to
Facebook authorize code
Enable Twitter Posting.
Twitter Consumer Key
Twitter Consumer Secret
Twitter Access Token
Twitter Access Token Secret
Twitter Account User
Field to Post on Twitter
Twitter Account Password
Insert link back to singleView page on site on Twitter.
